entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sainte-Agathe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
